content: **you ll love this beautifully textured blanket pattern - written in 3 sizes ** try the coastal comfort blanket pattern this blanket is beginner-friendly and works up quickly put colors together to create a gorgeous stripe pattern **pattern highlights** // alternating tall cluster stitches with a shorter stitch provides a great texture that still works up quickly // written & video instructions included **sizes** baby - 32x40 inches small throw - 38x50 inches large throw - 60x72 inches **suggested yarn** hobby lobby i love this yarn **hooks used** j 10/6 0 i 9/5 5
